verses.verse: Then Jacob <WH3290> went on his journey, <WH5375> <WH7272> and came <WH1980> into the land <WH776> of the people <WH1121> of the east. <WH6924>

And he looked, <WH7200> and behold <WH2009> a well <WH875> in the field, <WH7704> and, lo, <WH2009> there <WH8033> were three <WH7969> flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> lying <WH7257> by <WH5921> it; for <WH3588> out of <WH4480> that <WH1931> well <WH875> they watered <WH8248> the flocks: <WH5739> and a great <WH1419> stone <WH68> was upon <WH5921> the well's <WH875> mouth. <WH6310>

And thither <WH8033> were all <WH3605> the flocks <WH5739> gathered: <WH622> and they rolled <WH1556> <WH853> the stone <WH68> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the well's <WH875> mouth, <WH6310> and watered <WH8248> <WH853> the sheep, <WH6629> and put <WH7725> <WH853> the stone <WH68> again upon <WH5921> the well's <WH875> mouth <WH6310> in his place. <WH4725>
And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto them, My brethren, <WH251> whence <WH4480> <WH370> be ye? <WH859> And they said, <WH559> Of Haran <WH4480> <WH2771> are we. <WH587>
And he said <WH559> unto them, Know <WH3045> ye <WH853> Laban <WH3837> the son <WH1121> of Nahor? <WH5152> And they said, <WH559> We know <WH3045> him.

And he said <WH559> unto them, Is he well? <WH7965> And they said, <WH559> He is well: <WH7965> and, behold, <WH2009> Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> cometh <WH935> with <WH5973> the sheep. <WH6629>

And he said, <WH559> Lo, <WH2005> it is yet <WH5750> high <WH1419> day, <WH3117> neither <WH3808> is it time <WH6256> that the cattle <WH4735> should be gathered together: <WH622> water <WH8248> ye the sheep, <WH6629> and go <WH1980> and feed <WH7462> them.

And they said, <WH559> We cannot, <WH3808> <WH3201> until <WH5704> <WH834> all <WH3605> the flocks <WH5739> be gathered together, <WH622> and till they roll <WH1556> <WH853> the stone <WH68> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the well's <WH875> mouth; <WH6310> then we water <WH8248> the sheep. <WH6629>
And while he yet <WH5750> spoke <WH1696> with <WH5973> them, Rachel <WH7354> came <WH935> with <WH5973> her father's <WH1> sheep: <WH6629> for <WH3588> she <WH1931> kept <WH7462> them.

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH834> Jacob <WH3290> saw <WH7200> <WH853> Rachel <WH7354> the daughter <WH1323> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother, <WH251> and the sheep <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother, <WH251> that Jacob <WH3290> went near, <WH5066> and rolled <WH1556> <WH853> the stone <WH68> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the well's <WH875> mouth, <WH6310> and watered <WH8248> <WH853> the flock <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's <WH517> brother. <WH251>
And Jacob <WH3290> kissed <WH5401> Rachel, <WH7354> and lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> his voice, <WH6963> and wept. <WH1058>

And Jacob <WH3290> told <WH5046> Rachel <WH7354> that <WH3588> he <WH1931> was her father's <WH1> brother, <WH251> and that <WH3588> he <WH1931> was Rebekah's <WH7259> son: <WH1121> and she ran <WH7323> and told <WH5046> her father. <WH1>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Laban <WH3837> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the tidings <WH8088> of Jacob <WH3290> his sister's <WH269> son, <WH1121> that he ran <WH7323> to meet <WH7125> him, and embraced <WH2263> him, and kissed <WH5401> him, and brought <WH935> him to <WH413> his house. <WH1004> And he told <WH5608> Laban <WH3837> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things. <WH1697>
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> to him, Surely <WH389> thou <WH859> art my bone <WH6106> and my flesh. <WH1320> And he abode <WH3427> with <WH5973> him the space <WH3117> of a month. <WH2320>

And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> unto Jacob, <WH3290> Because <WH3588> thou <WH859> art my brother, <WH251> shouldest thou therefore serve <WH5647> me for naught? <WH2600> tell <WH5046> me, what <WH4100> shall thy wages <WH4909> be?
And Laban <WH3837> had two <WH8147> daughters: <WH1323> the name <WH8034> of the elder <WH1419> was Leah, <WH3812> and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> was Rachel. <WH7354>
Leah <WH3812> was tender <WH7390> eyed; <WH5869> but Rachel <WH7354> was <WH1961> beautiful <WH3303> <WH8389> and well <WH3303> favored. <WH4758>
And Jacob <WH3290> loved <WH157> <WH853> Rachel; <WH7354> and said, <WH559> I will serve <WH5647> thee seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354> thy younger <WH6996> daughter. <WH1323>
And Laban <WH3837> said, <WH559> It is better <WH2896> that I give <WH5414> her to thee, than that I should give <WH4480> <WH5414> her to another <WH312> man: <WH376> abide <WH3427> with <WH5973> me.
And Jacob <WH3290> served <WH5647> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel; <WH7354> and they seemed <WH1961> <WH5869> unto him but a few <WH259> days, <WH3117> for the love <WH160> he had to her.
And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Laban, <WH3837> Give <WH3051> me <WH853> my wife, <WH802> for <WH3588> my days <WH3117> are fulfilled, <WH4390> that I may go in <WH935> unto <WH413> her.
And Laban <WH3837> gathered together <WH622> <WH853> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of the place, <WH4725> and made <WH6213> a feast. <WH4960>

And it came to pass <WH1961> in the evening, <WH6153> that he took <WH3947> <WH853> Leah <WH3812> his daughter, <WH1323> and brought <WH935> her to <WH413> him; and he went in <WH935> unto <WH413> her.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> unto his daughter <WH1323> Leah <WH3812> <WH853> Zilpah <WH2153> his maid <WH8198> for a handmaid. <WH8198>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> that in the morning, <WH1242> behold, <WH2009> it <WH1931> was Leah: <WH3812> and he said <WH559> to <WH413> Laban, <WH3837> What <WH4100> is this <WH2063> thou hast done <WH6213> unto me? did not <WH3808> I serve <WH5647> with <WH5973> thee for Rachel? <WH7354> wherefore <WH4100> then hast thou beguiled <WH7411> me?
And Laban <WH3837> said, <WH559> It must not <WH3808> be so <WH3651> done <WH6213> in our country, <WH4725> to give <WH5414> the younger <WH6810> before <WH6440> the firstborn. <WH1067>

Fulfill <WH4390> her <WH2063> week, <WH7620> and we will give <WH5414> thee <WH853> this <WH2063> also <WH1571> for the service <WH5656> which <WH834> thou shalt serve <WH5647> with <WH5973> me yet <WH5750> seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years. <WH8141>
And Jacob <WH3290> did <WH6213> so, <WH3651> and fulfilled <WH4390> her <WH2063> week: <WH7620> and he gave <WH5414> him <WH853> Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> to wife <WH802> also.
And Laban <WH3837> gave <WH5414> to Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> <WH853> Bilhah <WH1090> his handmaid <WH8198> to be her maid. <WH8198>

And he went in <WH935> also <WH1571> unto <WH413> Rachel, <WH7354> and he loved <WH157> also <WH1571> <WH853> Rachel <WH7354> more than Leah, <WH4480> <WH3812> and served <WH5647> with <WH5973> him yet <WH5750> seven <WH7651> other <WH312> years. <WH8141>
And when the LORD <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> Leah <WH3812> was hated, <WH8130> he opened <WH6605> <WH853> her womb: <WH7358> but Rachel <WH7354> was barren. <WH6135>

And Leah <WH3812> conceived, <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Reuben: <WH7205> for <WH3588> she said, <WH559> Surely <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath looked <WH7200> upon my affliction; <WH6040> now <WH6258> therefore <WH3588> my husband <WH376> will love <WH157> me.

And she conceived <WH2029> again, <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son; <WH1121> and said, <WH559> Because <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> I <WH595> was hated, <WH8130> he hath therefore given <WH5414> me <WH853> this <WH2088> son also: <WH1571> and she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Simeon. <WH8095>

And she conceived <WH2029> again, <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son; <WH1121> and said, <WH559> Now <WH6258> this time <WH6471> will my husband <WH376> be joined <WH3867> unto <WH413> me, because <WH3588> I have born <WH3205> him three <WH7969> sons: <WH1121> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> was his name <WH8034> called <WH7121> Levi. <WH3878>

And she conceived <WH2029> again, <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son: <WH1121> and she said, <WH559> Now <WH6471> will I praise <WH3034> <WH853> the LORD: <WH3068> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> she called <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Judah; <WH3063> and left <WH5975> bearing. <WH4480> <WH3205>
